item.title: Students around the UK protest as anger grows over education cuts
item.author: Olivia Ribeiro,Kirsty Seager,
item.description: Students have once again clashed with police during protests over proposed changes to higher education. The protest, the second this month, planned to target the Liberal Democrat headquarters in central London. Thousands of students and school pupils gathered around Whitehall and Trafalgar Square to â€¦
